thread.title: TV | Ballers

author: Fiona Flynn
title: TV | Ballers
text: Dwayne 'The Rock' Johnson's first foray into the world of TV drama comes to an end this evening with a double bill. For those that may have missed it, he plays Spencer Strasmore, a former American football player who, after retiring from the game, is living the high-life as a financial manager for a ever-growing roster of hard-partying NFL stars. The first of the double bill tonight sees Spencer organising a reunion with an old opponent who he realises is the source of his angst. While the finale will see him forced to make a decision between two career opportunities.
